currenttask.desc: Convert MEEG file to EEGLAB set

removechannel.desc: channel(s) to remove (multiple channels are specified as colon-seperated-list)

downsample.desc: sampling frequency in Hz to downsample to

freqrange.desc: frequency range for display, specified as [minFreq maxFreq] in Hz

freq.desc: frequency-of-interest specified in Hz for topological plot (can also be list)
